message: I'm excited to offer you this unique opportunity to purchase a high-value product. I believe you'll find it's worth the investment. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1200000.

While I appreciate your offer, $1200000 is a bit higher than I'm comfortable with at this time.  I'm interested in this product but would need to see a lower price point to make it work. I'm willing to pay $900000 for it.  Let me know what you think.

I understand you're looking for a better price, but I have to consider the value this product holds for you. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I'm counteroffering at $1100000.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $1100000 is still a bit out of my range.  I'm very keen on this product, and I'm ready to pay $950000 for it.  This is a fair price considering the value I'm placing on the product and the potential savings for you compared to selling to John.  Let's see if we can reach an agreement.

I understand you're trying to find a sweet spot, but I'm not ready to give up on the higher end of the price scale just yet. I'm willing to make another concession, but I need to feel confident I'm getting a fair deal. I'm counteroffering at $1050000.

I appreciate your continued flexibility, but $1050000 is still a bit more than I'm comfortable with.  I'm determined to get this product, and I'm willing to offer you $1000000. This is a fair price considering the value of the product and allows you to sell at a profit.  Let's make a deal and finalize this transaction.
